ygData.subject: Re: Solusek
ygData.msgSnippet: Whenever you die in Sol A, if you wait long enough your corpse always gets moved to the zone.  Not quite sure why it happens so consistently in this zone, but
ygData.messageBody:
Whenever you die in Sol A, if you wait long enough your corpse always gets moved to
the zone. Not quite sure why it happens so consistently in this zone, but many
zones your corpse is moved to a certain zero point sometimes. In this zone it
always happens if you wait long enough. Perhaps the GMs got sick of being called
to help get corpses out of the lava.

MadGrizzle wrote:

> From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
> I then went back again and AMAZINGLY both my corpses were sitting at the
> entrance... Praise Brell Serelis!

--Eron
aeron@...

from The Simpsons:

"D'OH!" --Homer J. Simpson
